name: Galaxy Shooter 2D (Th3GameDev)
description:
Galaxy Shooter is a 2D Space Shooter.  I created it while enrolled at GameDevHQ.

 I Hope you Enjoy it

For the best experience play in Full Screen.

Controls

W- Move Up

A- Move Left

S- Move Down

D- Move Right

Space- Fire Laser

Left-Shift- for Thruster 

Escape- Pause Game
